title: How to Make a Chiffon Flower Hair Accessory

steps.headline: Cut the chiffon fabric.
Sew several beads in the flower's center for decorative effect.

text:
Cut the chiffon fabric. Cut out six chiffon flower shapes, following the paper pattern.Overlay the six chiffon flowers. Aim to layer so that the petals of each underlying layer peek through the gaps of the next layer; this will provide a fuller look. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/55/Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/5/55/Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet1.jpg/aid3146872-v4-728px-Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Sew all the layers of flowers together at the center. This is simple in and out sewing, nothing fancy! {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/29/Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet2.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/2/29/Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet2.jpg/aid3146872-v4-728px-Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Tie a firm knot to keep the stitching in place. Trim off any excess thread above the knot. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ee/Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet3.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet3.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/e/ee/Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet3.jpg/aid3146872-v4-728px-Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-2Bullet3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Sew several beads in the flower's center for decorative effect. The final action is to add a hair clip at the back of the chiffon flower. Stitch or glue the clip firmly in place at the back of the chiffon flower accessory. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/bf/Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/b/bf/Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/aid3146872-v4-728px-Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Done! You now have a beautiful chiffon flower accessory ready for wearing. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/94/Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-3Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-3Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/9/94/Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-3Bullet2.jpg/aid3146872-v4-728px-Make-a-Chiffon-Flower-Hair-Accessory-for-Girls-Step-3Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":327,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"518","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"}
